page.title: 16HEALTH CARE
page.content: The{mobile clinic}comes from Blackburn on Fridays. It arrives outside Belmont C.P. School at 2.45 pm and opens at 3.00 pm.It closes at 4.00 pm.{Babies are brought to be vaccinated against diphtheria,whooping cough, tetanus, polio and measles.They have to be 4 months old before they can have their first injection.A lot of equipment is used in the clinic ,like scales,toys,syringes,eye testing equipment and hearing testing equipment.The babies have to eat {health}food to keep them strong.They also have a special powdered milk. Health visitors come to the village school from time to time to time in order to check the children's eyes,ears and general health.No{doctor has a surgery in the survey area so most people travel to Astley Bridge, Bolton.
